com.igormaznitsa.prol.io
Interface ProlStreamManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultProlStreamManagerImpl, MainFrame
public interface ProlStreamManager

The interface describes an object which can be used to create reader and writer streams to be used by a prol engine

Author:
Igor Maznitsa (igor.maznitsa@igormaznitsa.com)

Method Summary
 java.io.Reader getReaderForResource(java.lang.String resourceName)
          Get the reader for a resource for it's name.
 java.io.Writer getWriterForResource(java.lang.String resourceName, boolean append)
          Get the writer for an resource for it's name (or to create new resource object)
 

Method Detail

getReaderForResource

java.io.Reader getReaderForResource(java.lang.String resourceName)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Get the reader for a resource for it's name.

Parameters:
resourceName - the resource name of a saved object which should be opened for reading. Must not be null
Returns:
an opened text reader for the object, must not be null
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if it is impossible to open the resource successfully

getWriterForResource

java.io.Writer getWriterForResource(java.lang.String resourceName,
                                    boolean append)
                                    throws java.io.IOException
Get the writer for an resource for it's name (or to create new resource object)

Parameters:
resourceName - the name of the opening resource, must not be null
append - if the flag is true then the resource will be opened to add new records at the end of the file, else it will be rewriten
Returns:
an opened text writer, must not be null
Throws:
java.io.IOException - it will be thrown if it is impossible to open the resource successfuly
